name: SpeeDash
description:
Run, run and run faster to reach the next level!

SpeeDash is a simple 5 levels running game, where you can reach the end of the level fast. But you will find obstacles on the way, so be careful! Feel the power of your dash, while running at high speed and collecting energy.  Can you percieve the might of your velocity?

Features:

-Run through the level 

-Run faster!

-Avoid all dangerous obstacles

-Collect the energy spheres

-Watch out the red sea!

Willing to move very quick?

Do you want to see what's in the next level?

Can you feel your velocity?

So Download and Play! 

F.A.Q

1) Who made this game?

This game is made by SmallFast, an aspiring game developer, that wants to do experience so that one day he will make games for living.

2)What's the quality of his game?

Since he's only a beginner and he's self taught, the quality is not very high, but it can be at least enjoyable as you can see in his old games Height Jumper, Burning Cowboy and BitParkourer ( you can search them on this site).

3)How does this game last?

SpeeDash is small. There are five levels, that individually requieres about 50 seconds to complete.

4)Is it a waste of time?

If you are searching for high quality games or well-refined games, maybe this isn't for you. But I can give you a simple and acceptable gameplay experience from which you can have some fun!

5)Do I have to pay in order to play?

No, the game is totally free. But it will be nice if you write a little feedback in the comment so that I can learn from you and improve my skills.

Update 26/02/2018

More difficult level after the first one.

Added the red water.

Little graphic improvement.

Update 07/03/2018
